name: Tempesta Media
tag_list: content-marketing, content-development, unique-content, seo-content, content-on-demand, web-content, content, writing, publishing, content-monetization, syndicated-content, distributed-journalism, articles
overview: Tempesta Media is a managed services provider for content. The company’s solution increases revenue and reduces costs for small and mid-sized businesses. Tempesta Media leverages its technology platform, Content Quotes™, and its expert content development community, Article Document™, consisting of nearly 5,000 industry specialists and journalists, to deliver expert content to its customers, without the time, administrative overhead, and cost associated with competing solutions.
